name: Chocolate Eclair Dessert
author: KBehrens2
summary: This is a no-bake pudding dessert that's so quick and easy to make--everyone loves it. I always keep the ingredients on hand in case I need a quick dessert. It's best if it sits overnight before serving.
ingredients: 2 (3 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
directions: Line the bottom of a 9x13-inch pan with graham crackers
In a large bowl, combine pudding mix and milk; stir well
Mix whipped topping into pudding mixture
Spread half of mixture over graham cracker layer
Top with another layer of graham crackers and the remaining pudding
Top all with a final layer of graham crackers and frost with chocolate frosting
Refrigerate at least two hours before serving to allow the graham crackers to soften
